properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6 v7 v8 v9 v10

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Ni nani mama wa
neema,
Bikira Maria. x2
Alimkanyanga shetani
akamnyang'anya
uwezo Bikira Maria.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:

mtakatifu,
Bikira Maria. x2

akamnyang'anya
uwezo Bikira Maria.
